body:
I like the idea of using GLOW - I didn't realise that it was usable outside of the go-gl library.
I'm wondering if we could use GLOW to generate the GLES 2 bindings for all platforms, then wrap these with ```x/mobile/gl```'s types.
It seems like GLOW might need to add an Android branch to the [procaddr.go](https://github.com/go-gl/gl/blob/master/v2.1/gl/procaddr.go) generated code. This however is [certainly doable](https://android.googlesource.com/platform/tools/gpu/+/studio-1.3-dev/cc/replayd/src/GetGfxProcAddress_Android.cpp).
